verses.verse: Moreover he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8798><s%> that thou findest <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8798><s%> this roll <S%H4039><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
So I opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and he caused me to eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8686><s%> that roll <S%H4039><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, cause thy belly <S%H990><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy bowels <S%H4578><s%> with this roll <S%H4039><s%> that I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee. Then did I eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it; and it was in my mouth <S%H6310><s%> as honey <S%H1706><s%> for sweetness <S%H4966><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, get <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with my words <S%H1697><s%> unto them.

For thou art not sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8803><s%> to a people <S%H5971><s%> of a strange <S%H6012><s%> speech <S%H8193><s%> and of an hard <S%H3515><s%> language <S%H3956><s%>, but to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>;

Not to many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of a strange <S%H6012><s%> speech <S%H8193><s%> and of an hard <S%H3515><s%> language <S%H3956><s%>, whose words <S%H1697><s%> thou canst not understand <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>. Surely, had I sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee to them, they would have hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee.

But the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> will <S%H14><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto thee; for they will <S%H14><s%> <S%H8802><s%> not hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto me: for all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> are impudent <S%H2389><s%> <S%H4696><s%> and hardhearted <S%H7186><s%> <S%H3820><s%>.

Behold, I have made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> against <S%H5980><s%> their faces <S%H6440><s%>, and thy forehead <S%H4696><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> against <S%H5980><s%> their foreheads <S%H4696><s%>.

As an adamant <S%H8068><s%> harder <S%H2389><s%> than flint <S%H6864><s%> have I made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy forehead <S%H4696><s%>: fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them not, neither be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> <S%H8735><s%> at their looks <S%H6440><s%>, though they be a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.

Moreover he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, all my words <S%H1697><s%> that I shall speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee receive <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with thine ears <S%H241><s%>.

And go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, get <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee to them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%>, unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto them, and tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; whether they will hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, or whether they will forbear <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Then the spirit <S%H7307><s%> took me up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and I heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> me a voice <S%H6963><s%> of a great <S%H1419><s%> rushing <S%H7494><s%>, saying, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> from his place <S%H4725><s%>.

I heard also the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the living creatures <S%H2416><s%> that touched <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8688><s%> one <S%H802><s%> another <S%H269><s%>, and the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the wheels <S%H212><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> them, and a noise <S%H6963><s%> of a great <S%H1419><s%> rushing <S%H7494><s%>.

So the spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted me up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and took me away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and I went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in bitterness <S%H4751><s%>, in the heat <S%H2534><s%> of my spirit <S%H7307><s%>; but the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon me.

Then I came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%> at Telabib <S%H8512><s%>, that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> of K'var <S%H3529><s%>, and I sat <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> where they sat <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and remained <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there astonished <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8688><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.
And it came to pass at the end <S%H7097><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, I have made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee a watchman <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: therefore hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> at my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and give them warning <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from me.

When I say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, Thou shalt surely <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and thou givest him not warning <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, nor speakest <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to warn <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> from his wicked <S%H7563><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, to save his life <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8763><s%>; the same wicked <S%H7563><s%> man shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> at thine hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Yet if thou warn <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, and he turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not from his wickedness <S%H7562><s%>, nor from his wicked <S%H7563><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, he shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; but thou hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.

Again <S%H7725><s%>, When a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man doth turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from his righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and commit <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, and I lay <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a stumblingblock <S%H4383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, he shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: because thou hast not given him warning <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, he shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his sin <S%H2403><s%>, and his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> which he hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> shall not be remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; but his blood <S%H1818><s%> will I require <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> at thine hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Nevertheless if thou warn <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> man, that the righteous <S%H6662><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> not, and he doth not sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, he shall surely <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8800><s%> live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, because he is warned <S%H2094><s%> <S%H8737><s%>; also thou hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.

And the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was there upon me; and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, go forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8798><s%> into the plain <S%H1237><s%>, and I will there talk <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with thee.

Then I arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the plain <S%H1237><s%>: and, behold, the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> there, as the glory <S%H3519><s%> which I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> of K'var <S%H3529><s%>: and I fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on my face <S%H6440><s%>.

Then the spirit <S%H7307><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into me, and set <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me upon my feet <S%H7272><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with me, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, shut <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8734><s%> thyself within <S%H8432><s%> thine house <S%H1004><s%>.

But thou, O son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, behold, they shall put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> bands <S%H5688><s%> upon thee, and shall bind <S%H631><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee with them, and thou shalt not go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them:

And I will make thy tongue <S%H3956><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to the roof of thy mouth <S%H2441><s%>, that thou shalt be dumb <S%H481><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and shalt not be to them a reprover <S%H376><s%> <S%H3198><s%> <S%H8688><s%>: for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.

But when I speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee, I will open <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; He that heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, let him hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and he that forbeareth <S%H2310><s%>, let him forbear <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.
